about_the_game:
Gone are the days of your ancestors' fame and fortune. You, a young man from a fallen noble family, have said goodbye to your homeland and headed to Wild Garde, where the most dangerous yet lucrative dungeons await.

On the path to reclaiming your family's honor, it's not just beasts and traps that keep you company — there are other brave adventurers who are eager to form a dungeon-crawling party with you. You must rise as a trusted leader, sharpen your wit, and guide them through perils and challenges within the depths.

Oh, and did I mention? They all happen to be charming ladies. Quite intriguing, isn't it?
　

Distinctive 3d Artwork





Anime shading, but more than that! When the crispness of anime style flirts with painterly aesthetics, the graphics of Horny Dungeon emerge. The game delivers visuals that come alive with each frame, showcasing characters carefully hand-crafted in 3D. A labor of love, if I dare to call it.
　

Fully Animated Sex Scenes





Enjoy a wide variety of animated H-scenes, from pure old-school missionary to domination-submission dynamics. Beyond static pictures or simple gifs, the intimate moments feature interactive controls*, letting you set the pace and rhythm to your preference.

*: Optimized for single-handed usage.
　

Sweet and Spicy Banter





Forge bonds with your lovely party members: Say something goofy that makes her giggle. Lean in and listen to her life stories. Mistake her favorite color for another woman's and find yourself sleeping on the floor tonight. The choice is entirely yours!

And fret not - this isn't a tsundere game where your head could get ripped off for dating too many different girls.
　

Rich Roguelite Experience





Explore procedurally generated dungeons where unexpected events await in the shadows. Experiment with various skill builds and item choices for each new run. Only those who balance risk and reward wisely can conquer the chaos within Horny Dungeon.
　

Stats Management and Character Growth





Reclaim precious loot to bolster up your party. As your heroines grow stronger, more options will unlock both on and off the battlefield. However, shinier armors and mightier swords aren't everything. Tending to their mental well-being is also part of your noble duty. Remember, a sad warrior is a dead warrior.
　

... And More to Come!





Horny Dungeon is a work in progress. We're always throwing in new voicelines, quests, skills, and (you don't say?) more sex scenes. The list of playable characters and NPCs is getting bigger as well.

So please stay tuned! For following up the development progress, please check our Steam Community and Twitter.

content_descriptors.notes:
Horny Dungeon is a fantasy game that features sexual interactions between characters. The content in this game includes nudity and explicit depiction of sex. 
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or distributions with similar kernels
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX330 or Intel Iris Xe
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or distributions with similar kernels
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8257U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 12+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro chip
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Horny Dungeon: Tales from Aesion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX330 or Intel Iris Xe
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Horny Dungeon is an NSFW roguelite turn-based RPG. Lead a team of captivating heroines, conquer dungeons and loot all the precious relics. Yet, the real treasures lie in the relationships you build along the way. And of course, they go beyond platonic...
